languages.text: "Мы нашли свидетелей побоев нашего лжезаговорщика. По их словам к задержанному Ярту действительно подходил блюститель в шлеме, говорил с ним, а потом долго бил, да так, что у него с пальца перстень слетел. Перстень, увы, обнаружить не удалось".

"We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."
languages.original_text: "Мы нашли свидетелей побоев нашего лжезаговорщика. По их словам к задержанному Ярту действительно подходил блюститель в шлеме, говорил с ним, а потом долго бил, да так, что у него с пальца перстень слетел. Перстень, увы, обнаружить не удалось".

traits.locale_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off his finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."

languages.text: "Wir haben Zeugen hinsichtlich der Körperverletzung unseres falschen Konspirators. Sie geben an, dass ein Enforcer mit einem Helm mit dem inhaftierten Yart gesprochen und ihn anschließend derart verprügelt hat, dass ihm ein Ring vom Finger geglitten ist. Leider konnte besagter Ring nicht sichergestellt werden."
languages.original_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Zeugen hinsichtlich der Körperverletzung unseres falschen Konspirators. Sie geben an, dass ein Enforcer mit einem Helm mit dem inhaftierten Yart gesprochen und ihn anschließend derart verprügelt hat, dass ihm ein Ring vom Finger geglitten ist. Leider konnte besagter Ring nicht sichergestellt werden."

languages.text: « Nous avons trouvé des témoins de l'agression de notre faux conspirateur. D'après leurs dires, un prévôt casqué aurait parlé au détenu Yart avant de le rouer de coups au point qu'il aurait perdu une bague. La bague, hélas, n'a pas pu être retrouvée. »
languages.original_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons trouvé des témoins de l'agression de notre faux conspirateur. D'après leurs dires, un prévôt casqué aurait parlé au détenu Yart avant de le rouer de coups au point qu'il aurait perdu une bague. La bague, hélas, n'a pas pu être retrouvée. »

languages.text: «Encontramos testigos presenciales de la agresión a nuestro falso conspirador. Según su testimonio, un guardia con casco se acercó a Yart, habló con él y luego le propinó una paliza tan grande que se le cayó un anillo del dedo. Por desgracia, no hemos podido localizar ese anillo».
languages.original_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."

traits.locale_text: «Encontramos testigos presenciales de la agresión a nuestro falso conspirador. Según su testimonio, un guardia con casco se acercó a Yart, habló con él y luego le propinó una paliza tan grande que se le cayó un anillo del dedo. Por desgracia, no hemos podido localizar ese anillo».

languages.text: 「私たちは、偽の共謀犯の暴行を見た目撃者を発見しました。彼らによると、拘束されているヤートの元にヘルメットを被ったエンフォーサーがやってきて、話した後で指輪が外れるほど徹底的に殴りつけたとのことです。残念なことに、その指輪は回収できませんでした」
languages.original_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは、偽の共謀犯の暴行を見た目撃者を発見しました。彼らによると、拘束されているヤートの元にヘルメットを被ったエンフォーサーがやってきて、話した後で指輪が外れるほど徹底的に殴りつけたとのことです。残念なことに、その指輪は回収できませんでした」

languages.text: “我们找到了证人，能证明是谁殴打了这个冒牌货。证人声称，当时某个戴着头盔的执法者来到了被拘留的亚特身边，和他说了些什么，之后狠狠地揍了他一顿，打得非常狠，就连手上的戒指都打掉了。遗憾的是，那个戒指目前还没有找到。”
languages.original_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."

traits.locale_text: “我们找到了证人，能证明是谁殴打了这个冒牌货。证人声称，当时某个戴着头盔的执法者来到了被拘留的亚特身边，和他说了些什么，之后狠狠地揍了他一顿，打得非常狠，就连手上的戒指都打掉了。遗憾的是，那个戒指目前还没有找到。”

languages.text: "Sahte komplocumuza yapılan saldırının tanıklarını bulduk. Anlattıklarına göre miğfer takan bir infazcı, Yart'ı gözaltına alarak onunla konuşmuş. Ardından da ona öylesine sağlam bir dayak atmış ki parmağındaki yüzük fırlamış. Ne yazık ki bahsi geçen yüzük bulunamadı."
languages.original_text: "We found witnesses to the battery of our false conspirator. According to them, an enforcer in a helmet came to the detained Yart, spoke to him, and then gave him a beating so thorough that a ring came off their finger. Alas, said ring could not be recovered."
